channel.title: A couple of errors i need help with
channel.description:
Well basically, my server runs fine and everything , most things work but after i have played for a while my account which on my server is 'mod tom' cant log in. i log in, i get disconnected, i log in get disconnected. which some would say is my server playing up ... but i made another account titled ' hello ' and i can play on that fine and it dosent disconnect ,
Also, the same thing happened to a friend on my server who had admin/owner status. He then created another account so he could actually play .. and i attempted to make him admin in the same way and it says everything is working, except when i compile and run server his rights go back to 0,
Any help on either of the errors would be highly appreciated
thanks - Tom

item.title: A couple of errors i need help with
item.dc:creator: @hellobud hellobud
item.description:
@hellobud wrote:

do you have character backups files???
because for some servers it deletes characters when you re-compile

Read full topic
item.source: A couple of errors i need help with

item.title: A couple of errors i need help with
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

well im pretty sure u just typed up a item or object in that spot and it messed up

Read full topic
